version.bug: Fixes an issue where the last playing track information would not properly persist.
Fixes an issue where pressing the up volume button once would decrease the volume.
Fixes a crash when attempting to send debug logs via the Feedback screen.
Fixes an issue that would cut the album title when in the album library tab.
Fixes an issue that would fail to properly sync album covers after the first sync.

version.feature: Adds radio station support.
Adds support for album covers on the library albums, and tracks tab.
Adds an auto-connect behavior when restoring the application to the foreground.
version.bug: Fixes an issue where the volume up button would not work when volume was greater than 90%.
Fixes an issue that would cause the library search to hang after navigating view details. e.g. After going to album tracks.
Fixes an issue where the remote would continuously pause videos playing on the device.

version.feature: Adds statistics dialog when you can check how many tracks, etc are currently synced.
Improves visual feedback when performing a library metadata sync.
Adds a feedback message when queueing tracks/albums/genres/artists.
Adds the ability to queue the album or artist when browsing the track list.
version.bug: Fixes a bug that would prevent users from queueing albums when browsing an artist's albums.

version.feature: Introduces the ability to change audio outputs.
version.bug: Fixes a bug with the feedback input being collapsed on smaller screen sizes.
Fixes a crash while starting or stopping the background service.
Fixes a background crash with the application service.
Fixes a crash on cover retrieval.
Fixes an issue with the service discovery
Fixes a background crash with the application service.

version.feature: Adds support for Android 11.
Improves the library metadata sync performance.
Updates to the latest Material Design library.
Integrates the library search functionality to the library screen.
version.removed: Removes the ability to hide the notification due to background execution limitations introduced in Android.
Removes fast scrolling due to performance issues.
version.feature: Improves media integration with Android
Some of the changes require v1.1.0 of the MusicBee Plugin to work.
Refreshes the playlists along with the library data.
Sorting now starts only from the triple dash icon in the now playing.
Adds the option to enqueue all tracks and play the selected on the library track tab.
version.bug: Fixes the library search collapse that did not work previously.
version.feature: Reworks the default action option to affect only the track view.
version.bug: Fixes the query for showing the albums of an artist.
version.feature: Adds the option to show only album artists in the library view.
version.bug: Fixes the tab colors in the Help screen.
Automatically scrolls to the playing track when entering the now playing screen.
Fixes an issue where the remote session volume slider wouldn't work.
Fixes the ordering of the Genres to alphabetical.
version.feature: Adds fast scrolling to the library tabs.
Adds Play Now (Queue All) option for albums.
Pressing the track info on the main view should now open the Now Playing screen.

version.bug: Fixes a crash with a null extras payload when updating the widget.
Fixes a crash with a null key event on the media intent handler.
Fixes an issue where the artist albums would not display properly.
Fixes an issue where the notification would not disappear on a connected wearable after closing MusicBee.
Fixes an issue where the volume control in the wearable notification would not work.
Fixes an issue where the temporary stop during track change would make the notification flicker.
Fixes an issue where exiting the application through an other than MainActivity would navigate to the main activity.
Adds a message on connection to inform the user in case an incompatible version of the plugin is used.
Fixes a potential crash caused by the progress updater

version.feature: Requires v1.0.0 of the [a href="https://github.com/kelsos/mbrc-plugin/releases"]mbrc-plugin[/a]
Changes minimum supported version to Android 4.1.x
Optimizations on code
Visual updateNotification of the application
Replaces previous startup dialogs with Change Log
Implements and optimizes a new library view
Adds basic playlist support
Merges Help and feedback views
Uses new API to load covers.
Uses new API to load lyrics.
Users new API for Now Playing loading
version.bug: Fixes an issue where the application would start automatically on device boot
Fixes an issue with the widgets that stopped to updateNotification after some time
version.feature: Increases the timeout of the automatic discovery function
Adds extra actions on the Incoming call action [i](Stop and Pause along with Volume reduce)[/i]
Reworks the connection settings detection functionality. [i](If the network allows it the detection should happen automatically on the application startup)[/i]
Adds support for Debug logging
Application now is written in Kotlin language
